# Test-MCDPrerequisite

Source: `source/Private/Core/Prereqs/Test-MCDPrerequisite.ps1`

## Synopsis

Validates runtime prerequisites for MCD operations.

## Description

Performs lightweight prerequisite checks for MCD operations, such as
verifying whether the current session is running in WinPE or full Windows
and optionally verifying administrator rights.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| RequireWinPE | SwitchParameter | No | No | Requires the current runtime to be WinPE (SystemDrive = X:).   |
| RequireFullOS | SwitchParameter | No | No | Requires the current runtime to be full Windows (not WinPE).   |
| RequireAdministrator | SwitchParameter | No | No | Requires the current process to run with administrator rights.   |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
Test-MCDPrerequisite -RequireFullOS -RequireAdministrator

Ensures the command is executed on full Windows with admin rights.
```
